A glazed donut is typically made of dough that is deep-fried and then coated with a sweet glaze. The dough is usually made from flour, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, and yeast.
A glazed donut is typically made with a dough that is deep-fried and then coated with a sugary glaze. The dough is usually made from flour, sugar, eggs, butter, yeast, and milk.
